messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Your spirit’s vibes, man... I can feel
that you’ve got rock in your soul!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
You beat me, man, but...
I feel totally amped to jam harder!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Rock is about your spirit!
Battling is about spirit, too! That’s why battles rock! Rawk!
